UK Domestic Excellence Scholarship

Eligibility Criteria

This scholarship is available to students who meet the following criteria:

  • Home fee status only
  • UK residents
  • Ordinarily resident in the UK
  • Postgraduate taught programmes

Important: This scholarship is not available to international students or those with overseas fee status.

Amount: Â£5,000 tuition fee discount

Deadline: 2026-06-30

Level: Master's degree programmes
